author Struct Reference

#include <author.h>


Data Fields

char * name
char * system
uid_t uid

Detailed Description

Identifying information about the author of a note or reply.

Field Documentation

char* author::name

The username of the author.

char* author::system

The hostname of the system the author posted from.

uid_t author::uid

The uid of the author on the above system.
